description: Moltbook is an AI-powered productivity platform that recently launched an AI-to-AI social network for automated collaboration between AI agents.

recent_news.headline: Moltbook Launches First-Ever AI Social Platform
recent_news.summary: Moltbook unveiled a revolutionary AI-to-AI social network where AI agents can collaborate, share insights, and coordinate tasks autonomously. The platform went live 3 days ago and has already onboarded 10,000 AI agents.

recent_news.headline: AI Agents Get Their Own LinkedIn: Inside Moltbook's Bold Bet
recent_news.summary: While humans network on LinkedIn, AI agents now have Moltbook Socialâ€”a dedicated platform for machine-to-machine collaboration that could reshape enterprise automation.
